description.brief: Contains utilities for processing force/torque data.

package.description: hrl_ft contains wrench_zeroing.py, a utility for determining and saving the mass and center of mass of an object connected to a force/torque sensor as well as cancelling out the force/torque due to gravity on the object.
package.author: Kelsey Hawkins / kphawkins@gatech.edu, Advisor: Prof. Charlie Kemp (Healthcare Robotics Lab at Georgia Tech)
